code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{payWithETH}from'./cryptoPaymentHandler';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function ETHPaymentForm(){const[to,setTo]=useState('');const[amount,setAmount]=useState('');const[loading,setLoading]=useState(false);const[txHash,setTxHash]=useState(null);const handleSend=async()=>{if(!to||!amount)return alert("Enter address and amount");setLoading(true);const tx=await payWithETH(to,amount);setTxHash(tx);setLoading(false);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"\uD83D\uDCB8 Send ETH"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{value:to,onChange:e=>setTo(e.target.value),placeholder:"Recipient Address"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{value:amount,onChange:e=>setAmount(e.target.value),placeholder:"Amount in ETH"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:handleSend,disabled:loading,children:loading?'Sending...':'Send ETH'}),txHash&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["\u2705 Tx Hash: ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:"https://etherscan.io/tx/".concat(txHash),target:"_blank",rel:"noreferrer",children:txHash})]})]});}export default ETHPaymentForm;
